provisions.title: Imposition of Luxury Vehicle Levy
provisions.content: (1) There is imposed by this Act an annual Levy to be known as "Luxury Vehicle Levy" on a motor vehicle with an engine capacity as specified in the second column of the Schedule. There is imposed by this Act an annual Levy to be known as "Luxury Vehicle Levy" on a motor vehicle with an engine capacity as specified in the second column of the Schedule. (2) The Levy shall be paid by the owner of the motor vehicle The Levy shall be paid by the owner of the motor vehicle on the date of the first registration of the motor vehicle; and on the date of the first registration of the motor vehicle; and on or before the due date for the annual renewal of the road worthy certificate of the motor vehicle. on or before the due date for the annual renewal of the road worthy certificate of the motor vehicle. (3) A motor vehicle registered prior to this Act is subject to the Levy. A motor vehicle registered prior to this Act is subject to the Levy. (4) The levies specified in the third column of the Schedule shall be paid in respect of motor vehicles with engine capacities specified in the second column of the Schedule. The levies specified in the third column of the Schedule shall be paid in respect of motor vehicles with engine capacities specified in the second column of the Schedule.

provisions.title: Exemption from Levy
provisions.content: The following motor vehicles are exempt from the Levy: tractors; tractors; ambulances; ambulances; commercial vehicles that have the capacity to transport more than ten persons; commercial vehicles that have the capacity to transport more than ten persons; commercial vehicles for the transport of goods; and commercial vehicles for the transport of goods; and other motor vehicles that the Minister may by legislative instrument exempt. other motor vehicles that the Minister may by legislative instrument exempt.

provisions.title: Collection of Levy
provisions.content: The Driver and Vehicle Licensing Authority shall collect the Levy imposed under this Act. The Driver and Vehicle Licensing Authority shall collect the Levy imposed under this Act.

provisions.title: Bank account
provisions.content: The Levy collected under section 3, shall be paid into a bank account opened for the purpose by the Board, with the approval of the Controller and Accountant-General. The Levy collected under section 3, shall be paid into a bank account opened for the purpose by the Board, with the approval of the Controller and Accountant-General.

provisions.title: Payment of arrears
provisions.content: A person who fails to pay the Levy in any year, shall pay all arrears accrued on or before the renewal of the roadworthy certificate. A person who fails to pay the Levy in any year, shall pay all arrears accrued on or before the renewal of the roadworthy certificate.

provisions.title: Regulations
provisions.content: The Minister may, by legislative instrument make Regulations for the effective implementation of this Act. The Minister may, by legislative instrument make Regulations for the effective implementation of this Act.

provisions.title: Interpretation
provisions.content: In this Act, unless the context otherwise requires,"Board" means the governing body of the Driver and Vehicle Licensing Authority established by section 5 of the Driver and Vehicle Licensing Authority Act, 1999 (Act 569);"commercial vehicle" means a vehicle registered by the Driver and Vehicle Licensing Authority as a commercial vehicle;"Levy" means the Luxury Vehicle Levy imposed under section 1; and"Minister" means the Minister responsible for Finance.
